page.title: 01A Favourite Park in Torquay
page.content: My favourite place is the park across the road because we can go there and ride our bikes away from the traffic. In the summer when our Guest House is full we play hide and seek in amongst the plants. It's safe because mum can see us from the dining room window. When our Guest House is empty, mum sometimes takes us to the park for an ice lolly or a picnic instead of the beach. I like lying in the sun so that I get sunburnt. My cat comes across sometimes and we roll in the grass playing with her. It's quite a big park and even though it says 'No ball games', I know the park keeper and he lets us play them anyway.
